fields_of_interest: Agriculture, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Sport, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: Development Cooperation, in the fields of modernization of public health facilities, supply of software systems and hardware equipment for the public administration, vocational training programs, advanced environmental and renewable energy technologies, engineering and supply of equipment for the agribusiness industry.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Q&T is an Italian engineering Company with an over 30-year experience in the field of development cooperation. The Company works in emerging and developing economies through funds provided for by the European Union, the World Bank, UNDP and all major regional banks, including EBRD, ADB, AfDB, and major development agency.
